name: bcv-rates
description: An open-source library that utilizes web scraping techniques to retrieve the official exchange rates from the Banco Central de Venezuela (BCV) https://www.bcv.org.ve/. This library is designed for educational purposes only. It aims to provide a simple and convenient way to access real-time exchange rate data for various currencies.
author: Larry Finol <larrysfionlb@gmail.com> (https://larrysfinolb.netlify.app/)
